show.subtitle: Mickey Huff is co-host of the Project Censored Show with former Project Censored director Dr. Peter Phillips. It airs on the progressiveradionetwork.com out of New York City
show.title: Project Censored

title: Project Censored
content:
Today on the Project Censored Show on Pacifica Radio, join Mickey Huff and Peter Phillips as they discuss “The dangers... <!--more--> of global war and social costs of the US Military budget.
” Guests include political scientist Dr Jeremy Cloward (for the hour), author most recently of the article The State, Class, and False Consciousness within the American Working Class; also, in the first segment Project Censored Award winner Bruce Gagnon joins in, who serves as Secretary/Coordinator of the Global Network Against Weapons & Nuclear Power in Space.
At the bottom of the hour, Steve Zeltzer and Work Week Radio.
The program concludes with Jo Comerford, Executive Director at the National Priorities Project, looking at the opportunity costs of US global war.
